name: fountain-tools
description: Multi-language utils for the Fountain scriptwriting format.

scripts.test:py: cd python && python3 -m unittest discover -s tests
scripts.test:csharp: npm run build:csharp && cd csharp/FountainTools.Tests && dotnet test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:js && npm run test:py
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:js && npm run dist:py
